title: ELP - Pictures At An Exhibition1970 -71(Deluxe Ed){2008}[EAC - F
description:
Emerson, Lake & Palmer - Pictures At An Exhibition1970 -71 (Deluxe Ed){2008} [EAC - FLAC] (oan)

2008 deluxe two CD edition of this classic Prog Rock album including a second CD containing 15 bonus live tracks,
all housed in a deluxe package with informative liner notes and a booklet crammed with rare photos and memorabilia.
Pictures at an Exhibition is a live album by the British Prog Rock trio released in 1971.
The original live album was recorded at Newcastle City Hall in North East England.
The opening track of the album was played on a Harrison & Harrison pipe organ which was
installed in the City Hall in 1928. The bonus disc features a previously unreleased
live performance of Pictures At An Exhibition, recorded at the Lyceum in December of 1970. Sanctuary.
